statements: DELETE FROM environmental_sensor_data WHERE sensor_location = 'Room A' AND sensor_type = 'Temperature';
DELETE FROM environmental_sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' AND sensor_value < 25;
DELETE FROM environmental_sensor_data WHERE sensor_location = 'Room A' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM blockchain_data WHERE timestamp < '2021-09-30' AND block_id = 'fa82473d-7188-46d7-a614-fff4d4ab603e';
DELETE FROM EnvironmentalData WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND temperature > 30;
DELETE FROM sustainability_practices WHERE verification_status = false;
DELETE FROM environmental_sensor_data WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 50;
DELETE FROM sustainability_verification WHERE is_verified = false;
